title: [Large-scale] ICT-based Volcanic Disaster Risk Reduction Expert Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic geography and disaster management concepts, with proficiency in digital device utilization
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training for professionals, utilizing tablet-based GIS tools

learning_goals: Learners can visualize risk ranges and develop evacuation plans using GIS tools based on volcanic eruption scenarios.
Learners can apply decision-making processes during disasters by combining geographical literature and ICT technologies.
Learners can develop and present community-tailored volcanic disaster response strategies through team-based projects.

resources: YOU@RISK Volcanic Disaster Edition Software License

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
